Descriptor: Basic general knowledge and ability to carry out simple tasks.
Basic factual knowledge in a field of work or study. Basic cognitive and practical skills.
Knowledge of facts, principles, processes, and general concepts in a field of work or study.
Factual and theoretical knowledge in broad contexts. A range of cognitive and practical skills.
Comprehensive, specialized, factual and theoretical knowledge within a field.
Advanced knowledge of a field involving critical understanding of theories and principles.
Highly specialized knowledge, some at the forefront of knowledge. Innovation in solving complex issues.
Knowledge at the most advanced frontier. Mastery of highly specialized skills and techniques.
